lessons.japanese: 給与が増えるに比例して、所得税率もあがっていく。
lessons.indonesian: The income tax rate increases in proportion as your salary rises.

lessons.japanese: 学校に対するあなたの寄付は、所得控除の対象になる。
lessons.indonesian: Your contribution to the school is tax-deductible.

lessons.japanese: ここからあがる所得は無税である。
lessons.indonesian: The income from this source is tax-free.

lessons.japanese: 前年の総所得金額はいくらでしょうか。
lessons.indonesian: What was the gross income in the previous calendar year?

lessons.japanese: 野党は所得税減税法案を提出した。
lessons.indonesian: The opposition party put forward a bill to reduce income tax.

lessons.japanese: 日本では、通常所得税は月給から天引きされる。
lessons.indonesian: In Japan, the payroll tax is usually withheld from the monthly salary.

lessons.japanese: 税務署は所得税の脱税に目をひからせています。
lessons.indonesian: Tax officials are zeroing in on income tax evasion.

lessons.japanese: 政府は特に高額の所得に対して特別税を課すことを決定した。
lessons.indonesian: The government decided to impose a special tax on very high incomes.

lessons.japanese: 所得税は控除額を上回るいかなる所得にもかかる。
lessons.indonesian: An income tax is levied on any income that exceeds deductions.

lessons.japanese: 実に高額の所得には特別税が課せられている。
lessons.indonesian: A special tax is imposed on very high incomes.

lessons.japanese: 慈善事業への寄付は課税所得から控除されます。
lessons.indonesian: Donations to philanthropic programs are tax-exempt.

lessons.japanese: 資産家は高額の所得税を納めなければならない。
lessons.indonesian: A man of wealth has to pay a lot of income tax.
